items.title: Pure Yang-Mills Vacuum at Equilibrium
items.content:
794: :label: cor-cg-pure-yang-mills-vacuum
795: 
796: The quasi-stationary distribution $\pi_{\text{QSD}}$ of the Crystalline Gas corresponds to a **pure Yang-Mills vacuum** with no matter coupling. That is, the gauge field dynamics satisfy:
797: 
798: $$
799: D_{\mu} F^{\mu\nu}_{\text{color}} = 0 \quad \text{(SU(3) gluodynamics)}
800: $$
801: 
802: $$
803: D_{\mu} W^{\mu\nu} = 0 \quad \text{(SU(2) weak gauge dynamics)}
804: $$
805: 
806: $$
807: \partial_{\mu} F^{\mu\nu}_{\text{hyper}} = 0 \quad \text{(U(1) Maxwell dynamics)}
808: $$
items.section: ## 4. Emergence of SU(2) × SU(3) Gauge Symmetry and Pure Yang-Mills Dynamics
